subject: Soccer
Bribery and Kickbacks
Ethics and Official Misconduct
lead_paragraph: The ban, which prohibits any involvement in soccer-related activities, stems from a payment in 2011 and may end Mr. Platini’s chances of succeeding Mr. Blatter as FIFA’s president.
snippet: The ban, which prohibits any involvement in soccer-related activities, stems from a payment in 2011 and may end Mr. Platini’s chances of succeeding Mr. Blatter as FIFA’s president.
